root.name: Super Robo Gakuen
root.description: Featured SeriesA list of series featured in the game. The game reuses the cast lists of Super Robot Wars J, W, and K (minus Tekkaman Blade, Tekkaman Blade II, Martian Successor Nadesico and Mobile Suit Gundam SEED), so there are no new series.Mobile Fighter G GundamNew Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless WaltzMobile Suit Gundam SEED AstrayMobile Suit Gundam SEED X AstrayMobile Suit Gundam SEED DestinyMobile Suit Gundam SEED C.E. 73 StargazerMazinkaiser (Anime OVA version)Mazinkaiser vs The Great General of DarknessGetter Robo ArmageddonSuper Electromagnetic Robot Combattler VSuper Electromagnetic Machine Voltes VBeast King GolionBlue Comet SPT LayznerSuper Beast Machine God DancougarHaja-Taisei DangaiohHades Project ZeorymerDetonator OrgunMartian Successor Nadesico: The Prince of DarknessKing of Braves GaoGaiGarKing of Braves GaoGaiGar FINALBrain PowerdFull Metal Panic!Full Metal Panic?
